p: The plant mixtures were created by considering the following criteria: the species were previously shown to be suppressive of the growth of parthenium weed (either ranked as strongly or moderately suppressive) [ 23], species providing functional group complementation (e.g., providing a stabilizing effect upon forage production and quality [ 43], species known to have good germination, seedling establishment and growth in the Kilcoy district and species recommended by the local experts. Ultimately, seed lot availability was the defining factor determining the final mixture composition ( Table 4).
